name: automation
description: IOTA Smart Contract for interaction with autonomous mashines

Task.machineId: AgentID // machinhe that is beign called
Task.amount: Int64 // amount in iotas beign offered for task
Task.status: String // status of the task. Can be: requested, approved, rejected, waiting or completed

state.owner: AgentID // current owner of this smart contract

params.owner: ?AgentID // optional owner of this smart contract

params.machineId: AgentID // machinhe that is beign called
params.instruction: String // instruction that is requested to be done by machine

params.response: Int16 // 0 for job reyection, 1 for job acceptance. Need boolean type here

results.owner: AgentID // current owner of this smart contract
